## Problem Statement
A clear description of the problem or limitation you're experiencing.
Example: "I'm frustrated when..." or "It would be helpful if..."

## Proposed Solution
Describe the feature or change you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Explain how you would use this feature in your workflow.

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or mockups about the feature request.

## Implementation Notes
If you have ideas about how this could be implemented (optional):
- [ ] Would this require new dependencies? (Note: we aim for zero dependencies)
- [ ] Would this require new keyboard shortcuts?
- [ ] Would this affect the config file format?
